channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023120230
item.description:
Report X-2023120230

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-01
  • City: SOMERVILLE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING MOTHERS MILK. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED IN THE AIR NETWORK. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM CAMBRIDGE, MA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 5AR135, STAPLES SHIP CENTER 00183, 186 ALEWIFE BROOK PKWY, CAMBRIDGE MA 02138-1121.

item.title: Report X-2023120747
item.description:
Report X-2023120747

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-22
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE SORTER BROUGHT THE PACKAGE TO THE REWRAP STATION. THE REWRAPPER, NOTICED THE PACKAGE CONTAIANED 6 AEROSOL CANS WITH NO OUTER MARKINGS. SHE BROUGHT THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA WHERE IT WAS DETERMIMED TO BE AN UNDECLARED PACKAGE.

item.title: Report E-2023120178
item.description:
Report E-2023120178

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of printing ink (UN1210) had been damaged by a sharp object and that 3 of the inner poly 1 quart bottles had been damaged and had released 1 quart of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023120137
